feed.title: Note Mark Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: V0.15.4
entry.content:
Changes

Fixed

  • 231; double braces cannot be escape (only temporary fix)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.15.3...v0.15.4

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: V0.16.0
entry.content:
:warning: Existing Users :warning:

Certain configuration variables have been renamed, please see below:

ALLOW_SIGNUP > ENABLE_INTERNAL_SIGNUP

Users accessing frontend and backend from different backends will need to migrate e.g.

api.example.com/api + example.com/ > example.com/api + example.com/

Changes

Added

  • closes #223; SSO via external OIDC providers

Changes

  • require go 1.24
  • closes #225; remove api picker from frontend
  • closes #226; migrate to pnpm instead of npm
  • replace all PATCH methods with PUT
  • update to es2020
  • general code tidying

Fixes

  • fix error when loading a user with no books

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.15.3...v0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: V0.16.1
entry.content:
:warning: Existing Users :warning:

Please ensure you have seen the v0.16.0 notice.

Changes

Fixed

  • closes #233; oidc flow cannot start on ios

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.16.0...v0.16.1

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: V0.16.2
entry.content:
:warning: Existing Users :warning:

Repeating the v0.16.0 notice.

Certain configuration variables have been renamed, please see below:

ALLOW_SIGNUP > ENABLE_INTERNAL_SIGNUP

Users accessing frontend and backend from different backends will need to migrate e.g.

api.example.com/api + example.com/ > example.com/api + example.com/

Changes

Fixed

  • closes #234; oidc flow cannot start when popups are blocked

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.16.0...v0.16.2

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: V0.16.3
entry.content:
OIDC should now work on Authelia.

Changes

Fixed

  • closes #236; include annotations in docker image build step
  • closes #235; missing state, should now work with Authelia

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.16.2...v0.16.3
